name: Surviving Picasso
tagline: The passionate Merchant-Ivory drama tells the story of Francoise Gilot, the only lover of Pablo Picasso who was strong enough to withstand his ferocious cruelty and move on with her life.

name: Shortbus
tagline: A group of New Yorkers caught up in their romantic-sexual milieu converge at an underground salon infamous for its blend of art, music, politics, and carnality.

name: Alien
tagline: The commercial vessel Nostromo receives a distress call from an unexplored planet. After searching for survivors, the crew heads home only to realize that a deadly bioform has joined them.

name: Agneepath
tagline: A young boy's father is lynched before his eyes; fifteen years later he returns home for revenge.

name: Zero Effect
tagline: The world's greatest detective Daryl Zero aided by his associate Steve Arlo investigates a complex and mysterious case of blackmail and missing keys for shady tycoon Gregory Stark who is less than forthcoming about what is really happening!

name: The Incredibly True Adventure of Two Girls in Love
tagline: An adventurous love story between two young women of different social and economic backgrounds who find themselves going through all the typical struggles of a new romance.

name: Coffee and Cigarettes
tagline: A series of vignettes that all have coffee and cigarettes in common.

name: Dreams
tagline: A collection of tales based upon the actual dreams of director Akira Kurosawa.

name: Margot at the Wedding
tagline: Margot and her son Claude decide to visit her sister Pauline after she announces that she is marrying less-than-impressive Malcolm. In short order, the storm the sisters create leaves behind a a mess of thrashed relationships and exposed family secrets.

name: Crazy in Alabama

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

tagline: An abused wife heads to California to become a movie star while her nephew back in Alabama has to deal with a racially-motivated murder involving a corrupt sheriff.

name: The Clan of the Cave Bear
tagline: A young Cro-Magnons woman is raised by Neanderthals.

name: Easy Come, Easy Go
tagline: A frogman working for the U.S. Navy dives for buried treasure.

name: The Iceman
tagline: The true story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man. When finally arrested in 1986, neither his wife nor daughters have any clue about his real profession.

name: Spellbinder
tagline: A young lawyer, after falling in love with a beautiful young woman, finds that she has an extremely mysterious past.

name: Erik the Viking
tagline: Erik the Viking and his men travel across the sea to find Valhalla to ask the gods to end the Age of Ragnarok.

name: High Art
tagline: A young female intern at a small magazine company becomes involved with a drug-addicted lesbian photographer, both of whom seek to exploit each other for their respective careers, while slowly falling in love with each other.

name: Goodbye Lover
tagline: Ben and Sandra are hot and provocative lovers, but Sandra is unfortunately married to Ben's younger brother Jake, and soon Jake will find out about Ben.

name: Paradise Road
tagline: Fact-based recounting of a group of women who are imprisoned on the island of Sumatra by the Japanese during World War II and used music as a relief to their misery.

name: Titus
tagline: This film is an adaptation of the Shakespeare play "Titus Andronicus." Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family. Who says revenge is sweet?

name: The Decline of the American Empire
tagline: Sexual revelations emerge when a group of academics and their partners spend a weekend at a country retreat.

name: The Proposition
tagline: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

name: The Piano Teacher
tagline: A young man romantically pursues his masochistic piano teacher.

name: A Sound of Thunder
tagline: When a hunter sent back to the prehistoric era runs off the path he must not leave, he causes a chain reaction that alters history in disastrous ways.

name: Masterminds
tagline: Trapped in a school which a gang of criminals has siezed control, a young troublemaker fights a cat and mouse battle from inside.

production.name: Youth Film Studio of Beijing Film Academy

name: The Mighty Macs
tagline: In the early 70s, Cathy Rush becomes the head basketball coach at a tiny, all-girls Catholic college. Though her team has no gym and no uniforms -- and the school itself is in danger of being sold -- Coach Rush looks to steer her girls to their first national championship.

name: Cop
tagline: An obsessive, insubordinate homicide cop is convinced a serial killer is loose in the Hollywood area and disobeys orders in order to catch him.

name: Vibes
tagline: Psychics hired to find lost temple...

name: The Corporation
tagline: Documentary that looks at the concept of the corporation throughout recent history up to its present-day dominance.

name: Breaking In
tagline: Professional thief Ernie takes Mike on as an apprentice, but while Mike clearly has "larceny in his heart", it will take him a long time to get as good as Ernie.

name: The Horseman on the Roof
tagline: In a time of war and disease, a young officer gallantly tries to help a young woman find her husband.

name: Cookie
tagline: Paroled labor racketeer "Dapper" Dino is sought after by a "politically ambitious" prosecutor schemes to put him back in jail and a deceitful partner sizes him up for concrete shoes.

name: Roman de gare
tagline: A popular novelist researches unlikely sources to find characters for her next bestseller.

name: Harrison's Flowers
tagline: When a Newsweek photojournalist disappears in war-torn Yugoslavia, his wife travels to Europe to find him.

name: Under the Skin
tagline: An alien seductress preys upon the population of Scotland.

name: Henry Poole Is Here
tagline: Henry Poole moves in to a house in his old neighborhood, to spend what he believes are his remaining days alone. The discovery of a "miracle" by a nosy neighbor ruptures his solitude and restores his faith in life.

name: Crooked Arrows
tagline: A story centered on a Native American lacrosse team making its way through a prep school league tournament.

name: Poison Ivy
tagline: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.

name: The Wind That Shakes the Barley
tagline: A sympathetic look at Republicans in early 20th century Ireland, and two brothers who are torn apart by anti-Brit rebellion.

name: Neil Young: Heart of Gold
tagline: A film shot over during a two-night performance by Neil Young at Nashville's Ryman Auditorium.

name: Rudo y Cursi
tagline: Two siblings rival each other inside the world of professional soccer.

name: Salaam-E-Ishq
tagline: Six couples in love must face different problems caused by love itself. Do they resolve their issues and face life anew, or do they succumb under pressure ?

name: Kinky Boots
tagline: A drag queen comes to the rescue of a man who, after inheriting his father's shoe factory, needs to diversify his product if he wants to keep the business afloat.

name: Harry Brown
tagline: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.

name: Damaged Lives
tagline: An extramarital affair leads to a young couple contracting venereal disease.

name: Hysteria
tagline: The truth of how Mortimer Granville devised the invention of the first vibrator in the name of medical science.

name: Boxing Helena
tagline: A surgeon becomes obsessed with the seductive woman he once had an affair with. Refusing to accept that she has moved on, he amputates her limbs and holds her captive in his mansion.

name: Hurlyburly
tagline: Hollywood movers and shakers dissect their own personal lives when everything seems to clash together.

name: Stone
tagline: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.

production.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

name: Delicatessen
tagline: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

name: Stormy Monday
tagline: When a corrupt American businessman tries to strong arm his way into businesses in Newcastle, England, he is thwarted by an club attendant and his waitress girlfriend.

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
tagline: Life of a very serious girl Naina, changes on the arrival of her new neighbour, Aman, who teaches her a new way to live.

name: The Nutcracker Prince
tagline: An adaption of the classic tale of a girl's dreams turned reality when her new toy turns out to be a young man placed under a curse.

name: The Mangler
tagline: A laundry folding machine is possessed by a demon from Hell.

name: The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys
tagline: A group of Catholic school friends, after being caught drawing an obscene comic book, plan a heist that will outdo their previous prank and make them local legends.

name: Fill the Void
tagline: A young Hasidic Jewish woman is pressured into an arranged levirate marriage to an older widower.

name: Somewhere
tagline: After withdrawing to the Chateau Marmont, a passionless Hollywood actor reexamines his life when his eleven-year-old daughter surprises him with a visit.

name: Valentino: The Last Emperor
tagline: A look at the life of legendary fashion designer Valentino.

name: A Better Life
tagline: A gardener in East L.A. struggles to keep his son away from gangs and immigration agents while trying to give his son the opportunities he never had.

name: Carnosaur
tagline: A genetically manipulated and very hungry dinosaur escapes from a bioengineering company and reeks havoc on the local desert town.

name: Flipped
tagline: Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites. Based on the novel "Flipped" by Wendelin Van Draanen.

name: Hunk
tagline: A computer nerd makes a deal with the Devil and gets a new, "beefcake" body.

name: Vanya on 42nd Street
tagline: New York actors rehearse Chekhov's "Uncle Vanya" in a dilapidated theatre.
